Keywords: Fantastic Four , Ruler , Wakanda , Warrior
Real Name: T'Challa
Team Up
1
THEMED TEAM-UP: FANTASTIC FOUR: If Black Panther is on a Fantastic Four themed team, friendly characters with the Fantastic Four keyword can use Precision Strike.
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering
PANTHER IN THE SHADOWS: Stealth. If Black Panther occupies hindering terrain, modify attack +1.
NEW LEADER OF THE FANTASTIC FOUR: Leadership, Outwit.

Comments
February 19, 2021
Goop
Outwit and stealth through the whole dial is just great and even better are his attack values in hindering. If you do fall to the lower clicks with not-so-good leap/climb you can still be annoying as hell outwitting from the shadows. He's good.
September 7, 2020
AluminumMan
Figure image - [url]https://wizkids.com/heroclix/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/06/mhc-fantasticfour-013a-136951-YXkijDT0.jpg[/url]
August 1, 2020
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 1-2 F4 Black Panther is a solid outwitter with some great offense. 60 points is pretty good for 6 clicks of Outwit - protected by Stealth. That much Outwit makes the opponent have to commit resources to taking him out and top dial, one does not just take out T'Challa. F4 TA allows him to heal up his dial -useful given his lack of Willpower - but improved movement and solid stats make this version feel like a bargain. EDIT 2021: With no more pushing damage, this T'Challa can be played more aggressively. His stealth took a hit and Improved Movement Hindering doesn't exist but 60 points for 6 clicks of Outwit is still a good buy.
July 14, 2020
KingofWakanda
Best keyword ever
